summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ambica Wedding Decor website. All backend APIs working perfectly (17/17 tests passed). Frontend functionality excellent with working contact forms, admin dashboard, and email notifications. Mobile responsive design implemented. Minor design compliance issues with arch-shaped service cards.

design_issues.issue: Arch-shaped service cards not implemented as per Royal Minimalism design requirements
Font compliance needs verification - Cormorant Garamond for headings, Manrope for body text

passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Admin authentication and JWT token management
Contact form submission with email notifications
Admin dashboard navigation and all 4 menu cards
Event, Service, and Enquiry CRUD operations
Homepage design with ivory background and gold accents
Google Maps embed on contact page
action_item_for_main_agent: Implement arch-shaped service cards using 'rounded-arch' CSS class as specified in design guidelines. Verify font implementation (Cormorant Garamond for headings, Manrope for body text) to fully comply with Royal Minimalism theme.
